statements: SELECT * FROM SQL_Injection_Monitoring WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, query FROM SQL_Injection_Monitoring WHERE detected_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT query, detected_at FROM SQL_Injection_Monitoring WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY detected_at DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, query FROM SQL_Injection_Monitoring WHERE user_id IN (50, 75, 100) ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT user_id, detected_at FROM SQL_Injection_Monitoring WHERE detected_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM SQL_Injection_Monitoring ORDER BY detected_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, query, detected_at FROM SQL_Injection_Monitoring WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT id, query FROM SQL_Injection_Monitoring WHERE query LIKE '%SELECT%'
SELECT * FROM SQL_Injection_Monitoring WHERE detected_at > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY detected_at DESC
SELECT query, COUNT(id) AS count_queries FROM SQL_Injection_Monitoring GROUP BY query HAVING count_queries > 1
SELECT * FROM MonitoringRules;
SELECT rule_name, rule_description FROM MonitoringRules;
SELECT rule_id, rule_name, rule_description FROM MonitoringRules WHERE rule_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM DetectedAttacks WHERE attack_type = 'SQL Injection';
SELECT attack_id, attack_type, attack_description, detection_time FROM DetectedAttacks ORDER BY detection_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM MonitoringRules ORDER BY rule_name DESC;
SELECT rule_id, rule_name FROM MonitoringRules WHERE rule_id > 100;
SELECT rule_name, rule_description FROM MonitoringRules WHERE rule_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM DetectedAttacks WHERE attack_type = 'SQL Injection' ORDER BY detection_time ASC;
SELECT attack_type, attack_description, DATE_FORMAT(detection_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS detection_date FROM DetectedAttacks WHERE detection_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM sql_injection_logs;
SELECT id, query_text FROM sql_injection_logs ORDER BY detected_timestamp DESC;
SELECT attack_type, detection_timestamp FROM detected_attacks WHERE detection_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT pattern_text FROM injection_patterns WHERE pattern_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM sql_injection_logs WHERE query_text LIKE '%DROP%';
SELECT * FROM sql_injection_logs ORDER BY detected_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, query_text FROM sql_injection_logs WHERE id > 100;
SELECT detected_timestamp, query_text FROM sql_injection_logs WHERE query_text LIKE '%DROP%';
SELECT * FROM detected_attacks WHERE attack_type = 'SQL Injection' AND detection_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_text FROM injection_patterns ORDER BY pattern_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM monitoring_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, query_text, user_id FROM suspicious_queries WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT pattern_name FROM suspicious_patterns WHERE pattern_name LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT * FROM suspicious_users WHERE detection_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND detection_timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS query_count FROM monitoring_data GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY query_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM monitoring_data WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT query_text, timestamp FROM suspicious_queries WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT id, pattern_name, pattern_definition FROM suspicious_patterns WHERE pattern_name LIKE '%SQLInjection%' ORDER BY pattern_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, detection_timestamp FROM suspicious_users WHERE detection_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT DISTINCT query_text FROM monitoring_data WHERE query_text LIKE '%SELECT%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT query_text FROM queries WHERE user_id = '987e6543-a21b-45c6-d789-098765432101' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT added_by, timestamp FROM whitelist WHERE query_text LIKE '%SELECT%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT query_text, timestamp FROM queries ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT log_id, user_id, action, timestamp FROM logs JOIN users ON logs.user_id = users.user_id WHERE username = 'bob';
